Articles.Content:
not sure if this have been posted...but....

Wednesday, Jun 24th 2015

In their latest bizarre claim, conspiracy theorists say they have found a replica of one of Egypt's Great Pyramids on Mars. Citing the 'near-perfect design and shape', they argue the 'pyramid' is evidence that an ancient civilization once lived on the red planet.

![BFd4ZjP.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/BFd4ZjP.jpg)

It appears that the Nasa operators of Curiosity deliberately chose not to take another photo or zoom in on the pyramid. If they however did so, none of these subsequent photos were released to the general public.'

ParanormalCrucible goes further, claiming the 'near perfect design and shape' means the pyramid is: 'the result of intelligent design and certainly not a trick of light and shadow'.

==============================================================

I am unconvinced. I think I'll await a human inspection. Given that there are only small rocks on Mars, that thing might have been built by super intelligent ants.
Illumi-justhappenstobearandomepyramidshapedrock confirmed!

This is the original photo: [http://mars.jpl.nasa.gov/msl-raw-images/msss/00978/mcam/0978MR0043250040502821E01_DXXX.jpg](http://mars.jpl.nasa.gov/msl-raw-images/msss/00978/mcam/0978MR0043250040502821E01_DXXX.jpg)

Here's a second photo of a wider shot: [http://mars.jpl.nasa.gov/msl-raw-images/msss/00978/mcam/0978ML0043200040404228E01_DXXX.jpg](http://mars.jpl.nasa.gov/msl-raw-images/msss/00978/mcam/0978ML0043200040404228E01_DXXX.jpg)

The "pyramid" is actually on a 30 degree slope slope and it has a pointy shape, the shadow only makes it look like a pyramid.
My god, it's just a rock. I see nothing special about it, just like NASA, who don't think this is worthy of more pictures.

As Albert VDS's link proves, there are many more very similar rocks in this photo.

![0978MR0043250040502821E01_DXXX.jpg](http://mars.jpl.nasa.gov/msl-raw-images/msss/00978/mcam/0978MR0043250040502821E01_DXXX.jpg)

Tinfoil hat nutters are bored people, remember that.

> 
> This is the original photo: [http://mars.jpl.nasa.gov/msl-raw-images/msss/00978/mcam/0978MR0043250040502821E01_DXXX.jpg](http://mars.jpl.nasa.gov/msl-raw-images/msss/00978/mcam/0978MR0043250040502821E01_DXXX.jpg)
> Here's a second photo of a wider shot: [http://mars.jpl.nasa.gov/msl-raw-images/msss/00978/mcam/0978ML0043200040404228E01_DXXX.jpg](http://mars.jpl.nasa.gov/msl-raw-images/msss/00978/mcam/0978ML0043200040404228E01_DXXX.jpg)
> 
> The "pyramid" is actually on a 30 degree slope slope and it has a pointy shape, the shadow only makes it look like a pyramid.

And it's about the size of a football (or a car, hard to tell without markers). So, I for one welcome our Martian ant/frog neighbours to the neighbourhood. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
All hail our tiny overlords!

> 
> And it's about the size of a football (or a car, hard to tell without markers). So, I for one welcome our Martian ant/frog neighbours to the neighbourhood. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

It seems the Simpsons got it right a long time ago:

![owwj9g9nb9kkfdpyuygtls13gqzgv73z3j1wbv1grefnr6twkx6xojipzu0hmbza.jpg](http://images.mic.com/owwj9g9nb9kkfdpyuygtls13gqzgv73z3j1wbv1grefnr6twkx6xojipzu0hmbza.jpg)

More seriously: I can go out here and find a rock similarly shaped. Certain types of rock (and crystals of course) tend to break with fairly straight and clean lines. Though curiously shaped rocks might warrant further investigation, you certainly need to find more to draw any meaningful conclusions.

It does, however, show rather well how eager some people are to jump to conclusions. It might be a fun game, however, to go into nature and see how many things you can find that could be explained in these kinds of ways ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-12T12:55:57Z" title="07/12/2015 12:55  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 12, 2015</time> by Camacha**

Interesting how these "conspiracy theorists" took it upon themselves to rotate the freaking enlargement of the photo so the 'pyramid' looks like its sitting on a plain somewhere. The darned thing is sticking out of the side of a hill.

I have a theory that the conspiracy theory is a conspiracy.

Human beings see patterns where there usually are none. My daughter saw a cloud that looked just like Hello Kitty once, too. Needless to say, giant Hello Kitty didn't destroy the city like a StayPuft marshmallow man in Ghostbusters, it was a cloud.

This is a really interesting thing, it's called "a rock." Anyone who lives around lots of rocks has seen rocks that look like all kinds of things. I remember at Koh Samui, Thailand, seeing "grandpa rock," and "grandma rock." I'll leave what part of grandma and grandpa the rocks looked like up to your imagination.

I'll admit the fracturing and stratification of all those rocks is interesting. It would be nice if there was something there to scale the size of stuff.

As for pyramids... from what I'm looking at, it's not even the proper shape/dimensions for a 'pyramid'.
Oh look it's a pyramid shaped rock in the distance. Looks like NASA's moved their rover from New Mexico to Egypt.

Oldest Overlord trick in the book - misdirection. Get public looking at "pyramind" so no notices concave column part with ***writing*** on it. (See arrow) Or Martian ***Lizard*** (top circle) peering at rover. (Now that is true curiosity.) Or broken Martian ***Turtle Statue*** (head left circle, half shell middle circle). Also note that turtle shell also has ***writing*** on it. Of course the ***Turtle*** could be sculpted from an Earth turtle since Venusians visited Earth before colonizing Mars after all the rainforests on Venus died when Nemesis passed too close. For that matter, the ***writing*** everyone is ignoring could even be Venusian. Only way to know for sure, is to compare it to the Irish Hinge Ogam found at Dighton Massachusetts along the ***Tau***nton River.

C'mon People, stop being sheep! ***Wake up!*** 

![L1xSSzs.jpg](%5Bimg%5Dhttp%3A//i.imgur.com/L1xSSzs.jpg)
Not to be rude or anything ... but, are you high or something?
Dat pareidolia, though.

> 
> Oldest Overlord trick in the book - misdirection. Get public looking at "pyramind" so no notices concave column part with ***writing*** on it. (See arrow) Or Martian ***Lizard*** (top circle) peering at rover. (Now that is true curiosity.) Or broken Martian ***Turtle Statue*** (head left circle, half shell middle circle). Also note that turtle shell also has ***writing*** on it. Of course the ***Turtle*** could be sculpted from an Earth turtle since Venusians visited Earth before colonizing Mars after all the rainforests on Venus died when Nemesis passed too close. For that matter, the ***writing*** everyone is ignoring could even be Venusian. Only way to know for sure, is to compare it to the Irish Hinge Ogam found at Dighton Massachusetts along the ***Tau***nton River.

I'm not seeing any of that, but you should totally email Richard C. Hoagland, he's been pretty quiet of late.
When I enlarge the rock circled lower-left, I'm seeing eyes and a sad mouth, as though he's agonizing over something ... like maybe this thread.

While you guys are having a giggle, 4.20 seconds after I posted in this thread my cellphone rang, and it was the Illuminati, and it said that I should stop making fun of it or else they'll spook me forever. I'm spooked already, and trust me you don't want to be spooked by the Spookinati, a part of the Illuminati that controls the New World Order, who faked the Apollo Moon landings (they were filmed on Uranus) and the Curiosity landing, because the world is flat and was built by ancient aliens.

 Share this to 1337 people to acquire Illuminati-proof and Alien-proof tinfoil hats.

> 
> I'm not seeing any of that, but you should totally email Richard C. Hoagland, he's been pretty quiet of late.

Got Dickie on speed dial. Got him on speed dial. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)

Some corners of humanity have had a fascination with the idea that there *must* be "something more to it," since 1877 - when Italian astronomer Giovanni Schiaparelli noted linear features he called "canali" in his observations.

(Perhaps Mr Hoagland is taking a break; a torrent of real photos and real science in the last several years may be wearing down his previous convictions.)

Hold the phone!... Wait a minute!... ***STOP!!!***

I take back everything I said.

While looking at other Mars images *I did find something!!!*

![ksp-incredible.jpg](https://lh3.googleusercontent.com/-hwFYQ0IdCAo/VI-QoNRG7KI/AAAAAAAAExc/bTb-F9HDWME/s800-Ic42/ksp-incredible.jpg)

I KNEW IT

IT ALL MAKES SENSE NOW

![Shuttle_mounting_point.JPG](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/f7/Shuttle_mounting_point.JPG)
![c0x21Ww.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/c0x21Ww.jpg)

![250px-Duna_TV.svg.png](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/de/thumb/5/5a/Duna_TV.svg/250px-Duna_TV.svg.png)

**They're taking over our solar system!**

They're doing transfers in our system, snatching our resources up

Trying to mine so we need to hide our kids, hide our wives

Hide our kids, hide our wives

Hide our kids, hide our wives

And hide our rockets, 'cause they're launching all of them out here

Kerbals won't come and say sorry

They're looking for fuel, they gonna find us, they gonna find us

So we can run and tell that, run and tell that, run and tell that homeboy

Home, home, homeboy

A rock.

It found a rock.
